description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b, line 5. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; spaces left for rubrication not completely filled in. Mild damp-staining; lower edge moldered. Leaves 292-300 and back cover detached. Origin: Likely mid-19th century. Incipit: ... الحمد لله ... اما بعد فيقول ... اني حين قرائتي کتاب معالم الدين
author: Qazwīnī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad Bāqir, 1799 or 1800-1847 or 1848
extent: 300 leaves : paper ; 214 x 154 (164 x 103) mm bound to 214 x 154 mm
creator: Qazwīnī, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad Bāqir, 1799 or 1800-1847 or 1848
